channel.title: Get On With It with Tineka Blake
channel.itunes:author: Tineka Blake
channel.description: Here's to getting on with life, or simply just figuring it out! This podcast contains real talk, real stories and real life! Here, we put in the time to discuss the very things that are holding you back from enjoying your life and achieving your full potential. Visit or contact me at: tineka-blake.github.io

itunes:owner.itunes:name: Get On With It with Tineka Blake

item.title: How To Successfully Change Your Career
item.description: This episode is for you, if you are thinking about changing or starting a new career. Whether that in employment or starting your own business. Here I share the mindset required and actionable tips that you can employ to make yourself succeed on your journey. Show notes and references 1. Harvard Busines Review Article: https://hbr.org/2002/12/how-to-stay-stuck-in-the-wrong-career. 2. Book: War of Art, by Steven Pressfield, 2002 (Chapters 1 and 2). 3.Tiny Habits by BJ Fogg 2019. Find me on Instagram: @tinekablake. Or visit my Website: tineka-blake.github.io

item.title: How To Use Habits to Achieve Your Goals with Sandra Chuma
item.description: We all love that feeling of success when you reach or even exceed your goal. In this episode, I talk with Sandra Chuma, a certified 'Tiny Habits' Coach to discuss how you can use your daily habitual behaviour to keep you on track for your goals. So whether you are struggling to get out of bed or sometimes find yourself with your hand in the cookie jar. Leave the negative self-talk behind and celebrate the small feats that you acheive everyday! Show notes and references: 1. BJ Fogg, Tiny Habits, 2019. 2. Rangan Chatterjee - Feel Better in 5, 2019. Find Sanda Chuma on Instagram: @sandra.chuma Or on her website: www.sandrachuma.com

item.title: How To Get Over The Fear of Judgement
item.description: If you fear being judged for something that you want to, or if you find yourself caring too much what other people think of you. This episode is definitely for you! We move past the saying 'what other people say about you has nothing to do with you' and explain and uncover the real reasons why you feel scared about doing things and how you can implement change so that you can get on with what you want to do! Find me on Instagram: @tinekablake. Or visit my Website: tineka-blake.github.io
